name: Daniel Villa Monteiro
biography: Daniel Villa Monteiro is the educational director of Alyra, a school dedicated to blockchain. He has been teaching and developing digital applications for more than 20 years and is interested in different blockchains on both a technical and societal level. His new challenge: to raise awareness and promote the adoption of blockchain in comics.

name: Lui Cixin
biography: Liu Cixin (Chinese: 刘慈欣) is a Chinese computer engineer and science fiction writer. He is a nine-time winner of China's Galaxy Award and has also received the 2015 Hugo Award for his novel The Three-Body Problem as well as the 2017 Locus Award for Death's End. He is also a winner of the Chinese Nebula Award. In English translations of his works, his name is given as Cixin Liu. He is a member of China Science Writers Association and the vice president of Shanxi Writers Association. He is also called "Da Liu" ("Big Liu").
